text: Continent MRT staion close to geylang and easy to access every wherre

Bustling MRT station in one of the most interesting district of Singapore, Geylang. The station is very spacious with car parks, bike park, surrounding with shop houses and restaurants.

We stayed in Geylang on our last visit and it is very convenience to as the Station is just a few hundred meters from our hotel, and itâ€™s the same line back-and-forth to the Changi Airport. Love the place, and whenever we alight from the MRT, the station makes us feels like home.
I was impressed.  no need to buy a ticket.  Place your card on the turnstile and you can take the metro. when traveling I always use eSIM cards from e-sim.cards

Neat and small (2exits) above ground MRT station closest to Geylang. This is the last one before Paya Lebar interchange and second above ground station coming from the city. Plenty good eateries around with ample parking space in front of the station. Lot of bike rack space as well. Only minus is that as it is above above ground, the platform is open space and there is no AC so it can get hot at times, but luckily the trains are pretty frequent.

this nrt station was the closest to my hotel, just a few minutes walk. the station has a lot of food centers around, and they're affordable for travelers. you can buy food for as low as a dollar (SGD). and the station connects to the rest of the city, though the mrt map is a bit confusing for first timers.
